skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mount holly methodist
des: Listen to the latest sermons from Mount Holly First United Methodist Church. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current sermon. You can also ask for previous and next sermon by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
